msbt.message: Everyone's talking about the fab new house Tom Nook built for you!Ohmigosh! Do you want some tips on interior design? 'Cause I'm totes the best at that, !I know every way there is to store stage costume. Just say the word!
! Your house is WAY large now! It might even be the biggest one on the island!You must've worked totes hard to earn that home. Ohmigosh. So much respect, !
Have you checked out the brand- new Resident Services building? It's WAY stylish now!I might do a photo shoot in there The countertop is so shiny! The light can really catch my eyes.

You know how I LOVE shopping?<10_4 /> How I love to BE shopping?<10_4 /> To HAVE shopped?<10_4 /> WellNOOK'S CRANNY IS BIGGER NOW! And the bigger the store, the better the shopping!Ohmigosh, that little store has come a long way! I'm going to be their most loyal customer, !

Ohmigosh! I saw that Blathers's tent is up now! Have you already gone and talked to him? He knows all there is to know about bugs and fish and fossils. I could just listen to him all day long.And sometimes you almost have to, .
Ohmigosh! I so didn't expect the museum to look this amazing. I'm so le bonkers about it!Blathers def knows how to put on a show. I have to get him to produce my first concert, !

Ohmigosh, my heart's kabooming right out of my chest! Is that over- the-top? I don't care! Know why? Because we've got a tailor shop now! FAAAAAAAAAAB!I'm this island's fashion icon, and that's a responsibility, my trendy bestie.I need a shop where I can take my time choosing clothes that will make you look at me and say, "POP STAR!"I'm going to be hanging around that store so much, they might just hire me, .

Ohmigosh, I am so happy to have a way up to the cliffs! I can go check out the scenery anytime!I'm def going to do a photo shoot up there. Imagine the sun behind me while I do fierce martial-arts poses!

The new resident made a solid call moving here. I mean, has you!And everyone's fave future pop star!<10_4 /> That's me!<10_4 /> I know you know that, but it's fun to say.Between the two of us, there's a bajillion-percent chance everyday life here will ROCK, !
